name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Frontend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in high-performance application development, specializing in modern UI frameworks and libraries such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**. Proven track record of building dynamic web applications utilizing **WebGL**, **Three.js**, and state management tools like **Storybook** and **Radix UI**. Skilled in implementing visually appealing designs using **Tailwind** and creating interactive user experiences through **UI/UX** strategies. 

Expert in integrating AI functionalities into web applications leveraging tools such as **OpenAI**, **Hugging Face**, **LangChain**, and **Stable Diffusion**. Proficient in developing real-time applications using **WebSocket** and optimizing performance with **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs. Experienced in automating testing processes with **Cypress** and **Vitest**, and ensuring code quality with **Playwright**.

In addition to frontend expertise, I possess comprehensive backend skills with **Node.js** and **Python**, and am adept in containerization using **Docker**. My strong foundation in compliance-driven development ensures alignment with industry standards while continually enhancing project delivery through innovative solutions.
